title: Egyptian woman carries her husband to vote
text:
Egyptian woman carries her husband to vote 7:53am EDT - 01:20 
An Egyptian wife carries her disabled husband to vote on the last day of Egypt's presidential elections. Zahra Mackaoui reports ▲ Hide Transcript ▶ View Transcript 
An Egyptian wife carries her disabled husband to vote on the last day of Egypt's presidential elections.
